tests.title: GET to /users should return status 200 and a list of users
tests.fullTitle: ReqRes API GET to /users should return status 200 and a list of users

tests.title: GET to /users/id for an existing user should return status 200 and the user data
tests.fullTitle: ReqRes API GET to /users/id for an existing user should return status 200 and the user data

tests.title: GET to /users/id for a user that does not exist should return status 404
tests.fullTitle: ReqRes API GET to /users/id for a user that does not exist should return status 404

tests.title: Get to /colors should return status 200 and a list of colors
tests.fullTitle: ReqRes API Get to /colors should return status 200 and a list of colors

tests.title: Get to /colors/id for an existing color should return status 200 and the color data
tests.fullTitle: ReqRes API Get to /colors/id for an existing color should return status 200 and the color data

tests.title: Get to /colors/id for a color that does not exist should return status 404
tests.fullTitle: ReqRes API Get to /colors/id for a color that does not exist should return status 404

tests.title: POST to /users with valid data should return status 201 and the user data
tests.fullTitle: ReqRes API POST to /users with valid data should return status 201 and the user data

tests.title: PUT to /users/id for an existing user with valid data should return status 200 and the user data
tests.fullTitle: ReqRes API PUT to /users/id for an existing user with valid data should return status 200 and the user data

tests.title: PATCH to /users/id for an existing user with valid data should return status 200 and the user data
tests.fullTitle: ReqRes API PATCH to /users/id for an existing user with valid data should return status 200 and the user data

tests.title: DELETE to /users/id for an existing user should return status 204
tests.fullTitle: ReqRes API DELETE to /users/id for an existing user should return status 204

tests.title: POST to /register with valid data should return status 200 and the registration id and token
tests.fullTitle: ReqRes API POST to /register with valid data should return status 200 and the registration id and token

tests.title: POST to /register with missing password should return status 400 and the validation error
tests.fullTitle: ReqRes API POST to /register with missing password should return status 400 and the validation error

tests.title: POST to /login with valid data should return status 200 and the login token
tests.fullTitle: ReqRes API POST to /login with valid data should return status 200 and the login token

tests.title: POST to /login with missing password should return status 400 and the validation error
tests.fullTitle: ReqRes API POST to /login with missing password should return status 400 and the validation error
